roleset.name: seclude
roleset.note: SECLUDE-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin. Member of Vncls concealment-16. (from seclude.01-v)

example.name: reflexive usage
example.text: When the band began writing material for the new album, they secluded themselves in the deserts around Palm Desert.
example.arg: When the band began writing material for the new album
in the deserts around Palm Desert

example.name: All args
example.text: John secluded her from the world.
